entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
